name: Edamame
description: Lightly salted boiled soybeans in their pods.

name: Miso Soup
description: Traditional Japanese soup with miso paste, tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

name: Seaweed Salad
description: Marinated seaweed tossed with sesame seeds and a tangy dressing.

name: Gyoza (5 pcs)
description: Pan-fried dumplings filled with ground pork and vegetables.

name: Takoyaki (4 pcs)
description: Ball-shaped snacks filled with diced octopus, topped with savory sauces and bonito flakes.

name: Salmon Nigiri
description: A slice of fresh salmon draped over seasoned rice, offering a buttery texture and rich flavours.

name: Tuna Nigiri
description: Lean tuna atop seasoned rice, known for its clean taste and firm texture.

name: Eel Nigiri
description: Grilled freshwater eel glazed with sweet soy-sauce, served over seasoned rice.

name: Shrimp Nigiri
description: Cooked shrimp placed on seasoned rice, offering a slightly sweet flavour.

name: Tamago Nigiri
description: A sweet Japanese omelette slice atop seasoned rice, secured with a nori strip.

name: Salmon Sashimi
description: Thinly sliced raw salmon, prized for its rich flavour and buttery texture.

name: Tuna Sashimi
description: Slices of raw tuna, offering a firm texture and mild flavour.

name: Octopus Sashimi
description: Thin slices of cooked octopus, known for their chewy texture and subtle taste.

name: Yellowtail Sashimi
description: Slices of yellowtail fish, offering a delicate flavour and smooth texture.

name: California Roll
description: An inside-out roll with crab, avocado, and cucumber, often topped with sesame seeds or fish roe.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: A roll filled with spicy seasoned tuna and cucumber, wrapped in nori and rice.

name: Philadelphia Roll
description: Combines smoked salmon, cream cheese, and avocado for a creamy, savory taste.

name: Dragon Roll
description: Features eel and cucumber inside, topped with thin avocado slices and eel sauce.

name: Rainbow Roll
description: A California roll topped with assorted slices of raw fish, creating a colorful presentation.

name: Tempura Shrimp Roll
description: Crispy tempura shrimp with avocado and cucumber, drizzled with eel sauce.

name: Avocado Roll
description: Simple roll with creamy avocado slices wrapped in rice and nori.

name: Cucumber Maki
description: Refreshing roll with crisp cucumber strips.

name: Sweet Potato Roll
description: Roasted sweet potato wrapped in rice and nori, offering a sweet and savory flavor.

name: Vegetable Futomaki
description: A thick roll filled with assorted vegetables like cucumber, avocado, and pickled radish.

name: Mochi Ice Cream (2pc)
description: Soft, chewy mochi rice cake filled with ice cream in flavors like vanilla, strawberry, and green tea.

name: Matcha Green Tea Cheesecake
description: Creamy cheesecake infused with earthy matcha flavor, offering a balance of sweetness and bitterness.

name: Dorayaki
description: Two fluffy pancakes filled with sweet red bean paste.

name: Taiyaki
description: Fish-shaped cake filled with sweet fillings like red bean paste or custard.
